caption.title: percentage reduction in XTT metabolic activity of Candida albicans (ATCC MYA-2876), C. tropicalis (ATCC 750) and C. dubliniensis (ATCC MYA-646) forming biofilms with the presence of different concentrations of Cinnamomum verum (CV) leaf oil and chlorhexidine digluconate (CHL). All error bars represent the ± 2 standard deviations (SD). All error bars represent the ± 2 standard deviations (SD).
